attributes.action: Overturn the government, get rid of all politicians who are in support of WW3
attributes.additional_details:
It is clear that our politicians are prepared to send our sons and daughters to fight a war that we haven't asked for.
We the people must put a stop to it. The only way to stop World War 3 is to stop the politicians from deciding our bloodied fate.
The time is now. We MUST stop them!
attributes.background: Get the politicians in support of WORLD WAR 3 (in the false name of defence) out of Parliament. These politicians are not for the people. We do not want or need mentally ill or evil politicians representing us any more.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or the Government to be removed.
